name: lmimf1o
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4
body: |- wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, clmim, c2)), wf1o(c0, c3, c4))

stmt.origin: simprbi(wcel(c0, co(c1, clmim, c2)), wf1o(c0, c3, c4), wcel(c0, co(c1, clmhm, c2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, clmim, c2)), wf1o(c0, c3, c4))
-| wb(wcel(c0, co(c1, clmim, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, clmhm, c2)), wf1o(c0, c3, c4)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, clmim, c2)), wf1o(c0, c3, c4))
-| wb(wcel(c0, co(c1, clmim, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, clmhm, c2)), wf1o(c0, c3, c4)))

body.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, co(c1, clmim, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, clmhm, c2)), wf1o(c0, c3, c4)))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c1))
-| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c2))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈(c1[LMIso]c2)↔(c0 ∈(c1[LMHom]c2)∧(c0 : c3 ↔ c4)))
⊣ c3 =(Base ` c1)
⊣ c4 =(Base ` c2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, clmim, c2)), wf1o(c0, c3, c4))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c1))
-| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c2))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈(c1[LMIso]c2)→(c0 : c3 ↔ c4))
⊣ c3 =(Base ` c1)
⊣ c4 =(Base ` c2)

comment: An isomorphism of left modules is a bijection. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 21-Jan-2015.)
